title: Justice, Dom Dolla, John Summit and More to Headline Bonnaroo 2025: See the Full Lineup
description: Bonnaroo's 2025 lineup also features RL Grime, What So Not, Green Velvet and Gorgon City, among many other influential dance music artists.
author: Jason Heffler
excerpt: Bonnaroo's 2025 lineup also features RL Grime, What So Not, Green Velvet and Gorgon City, among many other influential dance music artists.

html:
Bonnaroo's 2025 lineup also features RL Grime, What So Not, Green Velvet and Gorgon City, among many other influential dance music artists.

Bonnaroo's 2025 lineup also features RL Grime, What So Not, Green Velvet and Gorgon City, among many other influential dance music artists.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

The Bonnaroo 2025 lineup is finally here, and it's clear we're in for another big year on The Farm.

When it comes to electronic music, this year's lineup is one of the biggest in Roo's history. Justice, Dom Dolla and John Summit are set to headline, joining Luke Combs, Glass Animals, Olivia Rodrigo, Avril Lavigne, Hozier, Vampire Weekend, Queens of the Stone Age and Tyler, The Creator.

The undercard is also impressive. Notable electronic music artists set for Bonnaroo 2025 include RL Grime, What So Not, Green Velvet, Gorgon City, LSZEE (CloZee and LSDREAM), Crankdat, Claptone, ATLiens, Tipper, Barry Can't Swim, ROSSY, Zingara, Azzecca, Big Gigantic, Tape B and EDM.com Class of 2024 stars Levity and Of The Trees. Check out the full lineup below.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

Bonnaroovians in 2025 will also experience the brand-new Infinity Stage, a first-of-its-kind concept for North American music festivals. The hemispherical stage will integrate spatial audio and offer "the world's largest and most immersive 360° live music experience," according to its producers, the UK-based music tech firm Polygon Live.

Tickets are currently on sale and include four-day general admission passes starting at $420, four-day general admission-plus tickets starting at $695, four-day VIP tickets starting at $999, four-day platinum tickets starting at $3,995 and four-day "Roo Insider" passes for a whopping $26,000.

The 23rd annual Bonnaroo Music and Arts Festival is scheduled to return to the Great Stage Park in Manchester, Tennessee from June 12-15, 2025. You can find out more about the festival and purchase passes here.
